channel.title: Mopar Game Dev contest winner -- Budda! (and info)
channel.description:
For those of you who didn't know, a contest was recently held on the game development half of the mopar forums (http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php). These seasonal contests happen a few times a year and the winner gets a completely unique award that is based off of their game idea.
[img]http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/core/images/mgd_winner.gif[/img]
Only 4 people entered this time around (5 didn't make the deadline :( ) so hopefully next time we will have more! Note that the games don't have to be complex either. Being super pretty won't make you win, having fluent, understandable, exciting/unique gameplay will ;).
Here is the winning game: http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527213.0.html You can view how we score by this: http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,531415.0.html And you can look at some other submissions here: http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,207.0.html For a complete rundown of the competition guidelines, view: http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,526995.0.html
[u][b]What we want you to do[/b][/u]
[b]We accept _any_ language[/b] obviously someone using gamemaker wont be able to compete with the flexibility of a real language, but suit yourself :D
The GameDev forums target art, music, programming, and design. TEAMS are allowed to enter the contests, and everyone involved will receive the award. (Although every year the seasonal awards will be removed and turned into titles ex: "MGD Winner '11" to prevent clutter). We want people to find artists, request stuff from a sound person, or have someone help them with ideas. If you contributed, you are part of the winning team :)
We hope we get more people on gamedev! It seems to be a very nice middleground between MITB and Mscp, have fun and don't accidentally create another minecraft and be rich :|
So be ready for the next seasonal contest! Start working now (*cough* eggs *cough*) and you may just win!
